import React from 'react' import ReactDOM from 'react-dom' const Modal = ({ stone, isShowing, hide }) => isShowing ? ReactDOM.createPortal(

{stone.name}

{stone.type}

Origine:

{stone.origin}

Finition:

{stone.finish}

Epaisseur:

{stone.thickness}

{/* */}
, document.body ) : null; export default Modal;
